entry.title: WIND WARNING , High River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:19 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -16.4°C

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High zero.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness this morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 60 this morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 30 this morning. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Clearing late this evening. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 70 except gusting to 90 at times late this evening and overnight. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. Temperature falling to minus 5 in the afternoon.
